subtitleNullable: Decoding potato Market Dynamics Over 20+ Years: Price Trends & Arrival Quantity
descriptionNullable:
potato centre wise data analysis report: https://iitkgpacin-my.sharepoint.com/:w:/g/personal/dheerajkr_kgpian_iitkgp_ac_in/EZXGaLZeIMROigoCz7CbXSgB30bcGnNbFCyY-fF61uebkg?e=CyRYT1 

potato data reorganisation report: https://iitkgpacin-my.sharepoint.com/:w:/g/personal/dheerajkr_kgpian_iitkgp_ac_in/EcVj31J23M9ErIowpsS8PJsBu9YQmt10SGM6aAxTq0-SfA?e=bbsPBT

Context: The dataset is used for extracting and analysing the centre/mandi which has maximum datasize to have a good amount of training data which is to be fed in facebook prophet multivariate time series model for forecasting retail prices using various macroeconomic and climate features such as GDP, CPI, fertilizers subsidy price, rainfall , diesel prices etc.

Source of yearwise_data: The **monthly xls files** were downloaded for **potato crop** with **potato fresh** variety under **vegetables category** from **2002 to 2023** for **all the centers** using this webpage: https://nhb.gov.in/OnlineClient/MonthlyPriceAndArrivalReport.aspx?enc=3ZOO8K5CzcdC/Yq6HcdIxJ4o5jmAcGG5QGUXX3BlAP4= and then converted to csv files using an online xls to csv converter:  https://onlineconvertfree.com/convert-format/xls-to-csv/.

Source of the centrewise_data: Its the output of the following notebook:
https://www.kaggle.com/code/dheerajkr1a1a/potato-data-reorganisation
